localResource.name: Host_Type
localResource.label: Host_Type
localResource.queryString: select o.id.enumKey as enumKey, o.id.enumType as enumType, o.value as value, o.sort as sort from oVirtReportsInputControlEnum as o, V23HostConfigurationView as h where (o.id.enumType = 'HOST_TYPE' and h.hostType = o.id.enumKey and h.clusterId in (select distinct a.clusterId from V23ClusterConfigurationView as a where cast(a.datacenterId as string) = $P{P_DataCenter_ID}) and cast(h.clusterId as string) = CASE WHEN cast($P{P_Cluster_ID} as string) = '11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111' THEN cast(h.clusterId as string) ELSE cast($P{P_Cluster_ID} as string) END) or (o.id.enumType IS NULL and o.id.enumKey = -1) order by o.sort DESC
